category.name: Family Prayers
category.description: Prayers for family devotion and spiritual growth

content.text:
O GOD, THE CREATOR OF EVERYTHING GOOD,

I'm coming to You for the grace I'm going to need for this week's duties and events.
I'm stepping out into a broken world,
and I'm carrying my own imperfect heart.
I know that without You, I can't do anything.

I know that anything I get into,
no matter how harmless it seems,
could become an opportunity for sin or foolishness
unless I'm protected by Your power.
Hold me up, and I will be safe.

Protect my mind from subtle lies,
my heart from loving anything more than You,
my character from the stain of sin,
and my faith from every kind of evil.

Help me to not get involved in anything I can't ask You to bless,
or anything I wouldn't want You to see me doing.
Help me succeed in all the right things I do,
or prepare me for the disappointments.

Give me neither poverty nor riches;
just provide me with what I need.
If I have too much, I might become proud and forget You;
if I'm too poor, I might steal and dishonor Your name.

May every created thing be made good to me through prayer and Your will.
Teach me how to use the world and not abuse it,
to develop my talents,
to make the most of my time,
to act with wisdom toward those outside the faith,
and with kindness to those inside.
Teach me to do good to everyone,
especially to my fellow Christians.

And all the glory is Yours.
